revised_title: Double Horns of the Rhinoceros: Supporting Martial's Reading
tldr: The author presents a specimen of an African rhinoceros with double horns, supporting the reading of the ancient poet Martial against the criticism of Bochart. The author also shares the story of how Doctor Mead, a prominent critic, changed his opinion upon seeing the specimen. This discovery contributes to our understanding of rhinoceros anatomy and the interpretation of ancient literature.
